description: Style-specific evaluation context for ACRUE AI Restyle assessment

Movie Poster.description: Transforms the subject into a cinematic movie poster aesthetic
expected_transformations: Cinematic color grading (often teal/orange or high contrast)
Film grain or cinematic texture may be added
Background may be stylized or enhanced for drama
acceptable_additions: Movie title text or credits styling
Dramatic lens flares or lighting effects
quality_indicators: Would this look at home on a theater poster?
Does it capture the drama and gravitas of film marketing?
Is the subject portrayed heroically or dramatically?
common_issues_to_avoid: Subject looking cartoonish instead of cinematic
Colors that don't evoke movie poster aesthetics

Anime.description: Transforms the subject into Japanese anime art style
acceptable_additions: Expressive emotion indicators (sweat drops, blush lines)
Cherry blossoms or other anime tropes if appropriate
quality_indicators: Does it look like it could be from a real anime?
Are the proportions consistent with anime style?
Do the eyes and expressions capture anime aesthetics?
common_issues_to_avoid: Western cartoon style mixed with anime
Realistic elements that break the anime illusion
Inconsistent line weight or shading style

Chibi Sticker.description: Transforms the subject into a cute, super-deformed chibi character suitable for stickers
expected_transformations: Sticker-ready clean edges or cutout style
quality_indicators: Would this work as an actual sticker?
Is it immediately recognizable as chibi style?
Does it evoke 'kawaii' cuteness?
common_issues_to_avoid: Edges not clean enough for sticker use

Caricature.description: Transforms the subject into an exaggerated caricature that emphasizes distinctive features
quality_indicators: Is the subject still recognizable despite exaggeration?
Do the exaggerations capture the subject's essence?
Does it feel like skilled caricature art?

Plush Toy.description: Transforms the subject into a soft, cuddly plush toy aesthetic
quality_indicators: Does it look like an actual plush toy?
Can you imagine hugging this?
Are the textures convincingly soft?
common_issues_to_avoid: Hard edges that don't feel plush

Superhero.description: Transforms the subject into a comic book superhero aesthetic
quality_indicators: Does it feel like a comic book cover?
Is the heroic quality captured?
Would this fit in a superhero universe?
common_issues_to_avoid: Costume elements that look out of place
Missing the dynamic energy of superhero art

Toy Model.description: Transforms the scene into a miniature toy/diorama aesthetic (tilt-shift effect)
expected_transformations: Toy-like or plastic quality to objects
quality_indicators: Does the scene look like a tiny model?
Is the tilt-shift effect convincing?
Does it evoke toy photography?
common_issues_to_avoid: Colors too muted for toy aesthetic

Graffiti.description: Transforms the subject into street art/graffiti style
quality_indicators: Does it look like authentic street art?
Is the urban energy captured?
Would this fit on a city wall?
common_issues_to_avoid: Missing the raw street art quality

Crochet Art.description: Transforms the subject into a crocheted/yarn art appearance
quality_indicators: Does it look handmade from yarn?
Are crochet textures convincing?
Would crafters recognize the technique?
common_issues_to_avoid: Texture looking painted rather than yarn

Doodle.description: Transforms the subject into a hand-drawn doodle/sketch style
quality_indicators: Does it look hand-drawn?
Is the casual doodle quality captured?
Would this fit in a sketchbook?

Pencil Portrait.description: Transforms the subject into a realistic pencil drawing/sketch
quality_indicators: Does it look like a skilled pencil portrait?
Is the graphite texture convincing?
Would this pass as traditional art?
common_issues_to_avoid: Shading that doesn't match pencil technique

Storybook.description: Transforms the subject into children's book illustration style
quality_indicators: Would this fit in a children's book?
Is the warm, inviting quality present?
Does it evoke wonder and imagination?
common_issues_to_avoid: Too dark or scary for storybook
Style too mature for children's illustration

Photo Booth.description: Applies fun photo booth style effects and filters
quality_indicators: Does it capture photo booth fun?
Is it party/celebration appropriate?
Would this be fun to share?
common_issues_to_avoid: Missing the playful photo booth energy

Pop Art.description: Transforms the subject into Warhol/Lichtenstein style pop art
quality_indicators: Is the pop art style unmistakable?
Does it evoke Warhol or Lichtenstein?
Is the bold graphic quality captured?
common_issues_to_avoid: Missing the iconic pop art boldness
Halftone or color treatment too subtle

expected_transformations: Clear transformation from photo to target style
quality_indicators: Is the style clearly recognizable?
Is the subject still identifiable?
Is the transformation complete and consistent?
